ctx: intros p f x y Hloc.
exceptions.tactic: rewrite <- (ex_diff_n_deriv 1 p 0 p f x y).
exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat f : R -> R -> R x, y : R Hloc : locally_2d (ex_diff_n f (S p)) x y The term "p" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "(p + 0 <= 1)%nat".

original: intros p f x y Hloc. unfold partial_derive. rewrite <- (ex_diff_n_deriv 1 p 0 p f x y). rewrite (ex_diff_n_ex_deriv_inf_2 p 0 p). - rewrite (partial_derive_add_zero (fun z w => f z w) 1 0 p p x y). rewrite (partial_derive_add_zero f 1 0 p p x y). rewrite (partial_derive_ext_loc f (fun u v => Derive (fun z => f z v) u) 1 p x y). + reflexivity. + apply ex_diff_n_ex_deriv_inf_1; [|apply Hloc]. unfold ex_diff_n. simpl. tauto. - reflexivity.
